Articles.Content:
Just got a job offer that requires me to move tomorrow. Called me up and asked me to start the next day. They provide accommodation.

Great. But the laptop I use is my fiancee's and ill need to save up for a month to buy a new one (and buy KSP again)

I've not been here long, but I love this game and will miss it dearly for the next month.

Have fun guys. Blow some kerbals up for me.
It'll be cool when you play it again with some new features.
Sad but do need to rebuy the game? dont you have a account?
gl with the new job!

I was in a similar situation a few years back, but with another game, so I feel for you. Good luck with the new job, and just do well in your new job--focus on it, and the next thing you know, you've already saved enough to buy your new rig
You do not need to rebuy this game later.
Congrats on the new job. And don't worry. I hear the KSP-withdrawal tremors go away after a few weeks.

I was in a similar situation a few years back, but with another game, so I feel for you. Good luck with the new job, and just do well in your new job--focus on it, and the next thing you know, you've already saved enough to buy your new rig

Live in position so accommodation is free.

With no rent to pay I should have a new setup on my first paycheck. :-D
Why do you need to buy the game again?
Was under her account. Ill need to setup my own one on new pc.

Congrats on the new job. And don't worry. I hear the KSP-withdrawal tremors go away after a few weeks.

They don't go away...They never go away....
KSP will populate your dreams, hang on! Good luck with new job!
Congrats on the new position!
Good luck with missing jeb
I sure hope OP is the only person who rebuys PC games.

I sure hope OP is the only person who rebuys PC games.

I don't need to. I could easily redownload it using the old account.

I've spent far more money on games that are nowhere near as fun or interesting as KSP. I don't mind paying again to fund its development.

Was under her account. Ill need to setup my own one on new pc.

Her KSP-store account or her windows account? If its the latter then you can just redownload it. Dont think there is a limit to how many copys of the game you can have. I have tons of em on all of my computers.
Is she still your fiancee?

Pfffsh, you had me at "Blow up some kerbals for me!"

No, but really, good luck with the new job.

Is she still your fiancee?

Ha, oh yes.
